text: hey there fellow travelers and
do-gooders mark here with Walters world
and we're in Quincy Illinois that's the
muddy Mississippi right behind me and
this is where little marquee grew up
however bill marquee almost didn't make
it to his second birthday I was born
with two holes in my heart and my valves
didn't work so I was born with
congenital heart defects and this is a
cause that Walters world and all the
Walters world family are very passionate
about help raising money for research
for diagnosis analysis treatments for
congenital heart defects because
millions of children are affected every
year by congenital heart defects and too
many children don't make it to their
first birthday because of these things
that's why Walters world we're selling
t-shirts for until September 21st to
help raise money for the Children's
Heart Foundation this is the top
organization in my opinion and raising
money for congenital heart defect
research whether it's in diagnosis
analysis treatment helping families cope
helping children cope it's a fantastic
organization and we're just trying to
help them out so if you've wanted to
have a walters world t-shirt they're
really cool it's a v-neck black t-shirt
with a walters world logo all proceeds
of these t-shirt sales goes to the
Children's Heart Foundation okay we keep
nothing you get to look sexy in a
Walters world shirt and we get to raise
money so please if you can buy a t-shirt
they're 18 bucks they ship it everywhere
in the world I found a place that would
do that so we have that so if you're
walters world fan or you're a fan of
helping save children's lives and making
the world a better place please order a
t-shirt order to order three we have
men's and women's cuts so you can have a
more you know sleek look if you like but
just know that all the proceeds go for a
great cause and we'd really appreciate
it because it's not just Walters world's
that affected me personally my family my
best friend the best man at my wedding
his son grant Michael golfer he wasn't
one of the lucky ones he didn't get to
make to his first birthday because of
congenital heart defects and I don't
want this to happen to anyone out there
okay because we can do something about

and thank you for your support and keep
